About me

I’m a scientist, developer and researcher interested in astrophysics, security/crypto, and data analysis. I’m an avid user of free and open source software, and I care deeply about privacy rights and freedom of speech and information. Here are some links to find out more about me and my projects:

  • Twitter - Follow me or drop me a line
  • Github - Some of my public codes/slides
  • Kaggle - Machine learning competitions

I can be contacted by email at jen at redshiftzero dot com. My PGP fingerprint is 1308 98DB C324 62D4 1C7D 298E BCDF 35DB 90CC 0310.
